Description: Fragment of round handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine light brown. Rectangular stamp with aplustra symbol.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '351'. Name Isidoros. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0369.35 and an example on Rhodes.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (170)
